altTitles.en: Fate Through a Glass Darkly

description.en: Jiang Xiaoman, a university student and online writer, inherits a mysterious job from her father. Working as the archdemon Qin Lan's assistant, she begins to tackle strange cases with Qin Lan. As the two clashing personalities band together to solve each bizarre yet heart-rending case, they develop special feelings towards each other.

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE学園

altTitles.en: One Piece School

description.en: A spin off where the One Piece cast goes to a big academy & lives modern lives.
description.vi: One Piece phiên bản học đường

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Handsome Girl Being Made to Understand Something in a World Where Sex Practice Is Introduced in Health and Physical Education

altTitles.ja: 保健体育で◯っクス実習の導入された世界でイケメン女子がわからされる漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoken Taiiku de Sex Jisshuu no Dounyuu Sareta Sekai de Ikemen Joshi ga Wakarasareru Manga

altTitles.ja: 顔だけ良いクラスメイトがやたらとグイグイ来る百合の話

altTitles.en: A Yuri Story About How My Classmate Whose Only Good Trait Is Her Excessively Pretty Face Comes at Me Relentlessly

altTitles.th: คนเดือด เมืองดิบ

altTitles.ja: サンケンロック

description.en: Ken, a young Japanese guy, is in love with a young Korean girl, Yumin. He followed her in Korea and wants to become a policeman just like her. But then, he finds himself at the head of a local gang. What will happen to Ken?
description.pt-br: Ken, é um jovem delinquente japonês, ele é apaixonado por uma garota que na verdade não é japonesa e sim coreana, seu verdadeiro nome é Yumin, e ela tem o sonho de voltar pra coreia e ser tornar uma policial. Depois de muito tempo, Ken consegue informações sobre Yumin e vai para coreia tentar virar policial junto com Yumin, mas acaba se envolvendo com os “Jobok” (Máfia Coreana) e acaba se tornando um, como será a vida do Ken como um Jobok?

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

title.en: Kimi ga Bokura wo Akuma to Yonda Koro

altTitles.en: Back When You Called Us Devils
The bird has flown, that ship has sailed

altTitles.zh: 你将我们称作恶魔之时

altTitles.zh-hk: 你將我們稱作惡魔之時

altTitles.ja: 君が僕らを悪魔と呼んだ頃

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ga Bokura o Akuma to Yonda Koro

description.en: Yusuke Saito is a normal high school kid...well, normal enough, though there's six months missing out of his memory. But when he starts to get confronted by people who insist they're from his past, who allege that he did horrible things to them...suddenly Yusuke realizes that those missing six months may be crucial to remember. Otherwise, the skeletons in his closet may just make him a skeleton, too...

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

altTitles.en: May I Live With You?

altTitles.vi: Chúng Ta Có Thể Sống Cùng Nhau Được Không?

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.vi: Hiromi Sonoda bị bạn gái bỏ, thất nghiệp và bị đuổi khỏi nhà, và rồi cậu ấy tìm được một căn nhà cho thuê ở chung giá rẻ. Một bộ truyện tình yêu lãng mạn giữa những người sống trong cùng một ngôi nhà được sáng tác bởi tác giả của Domestic na Kanojo
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.en: Human Weapon - Katsuo

altTitles.ja: 人間凶器カツオ!

description.en: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.

altTitles.ja: 聖女に嘘は通じない

altTitles.en: You Can't Lie to the Saintess
You Can't Lie to a Saint

description.en: Chloe, who works as an apprentice priestess in a remote church, is a money-loving girl who makes a lot of money at night by gambling at cards, using her insight and memory as weapons. When Erald, a rich holy knight, visits her, he asks her to infiltrate the church as a candidate for sainthood and find the murderer who committed a murder two years ago…?
description.ja: 辺境の教会で神官見習いとして働くクロエは、持ち前の洞察力と記憶力を武器に、夜な夜なカード賭博で荒稼ぎするお金大好き少女。そんな彼女のもとを訪れた成金聖騎士エラルドは、「聖女候補として大教会に潜入し、二年前の殺人事件の犯人を見つけてほしい」とクロエに依頼をして‥‥！？

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en:
When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game’s character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story’s most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags!  
  
Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!

altTitles.en: A Classmate With Fierce Eyes

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.en: By Chance, a Match Made in Heaven
Match Made in Heaven by Chance
Accidentally Heavenly Match

altTitles.th: โชคชะตานำพารัก

altTitles.ja: いきなり結婚生活

altTitles.vi: Lớ Ngớ Vớ Phải Tình Yêu

description.en: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
description.es: Jia Han, una trabajadora independiente sin trabajo de 32 años, está cansada de que sus padres insistan con que se case y se vaya de la casa. Cuando se encuentra con un amigo de la infancia, Mincheol Jin, que siente la misma presión por parte de sus padres, dice sin pensar que casarse sería una buena solución para los problemas de los dos. Pero no se imaginaba que él aceptaría su propuesta y, de repente, se encuentra de camino al altar. ¡Una historia sobre un romance inesperado que no podrás dejar de leer!
description.fr: Jia, 32 ans, sans-emploi, vit toujours avec ses parents. En ayant marre de la pression de sa famille, par un coup de tête, elle fait une demande en mariage à son ami d'enfance, Mincheol, qu'elle vient tout juste de recroiser après des années. À sa grande surprise, celui-ci accepte directement sa proposition et d'un jour à l'autre elle se trouve mariée à Mincheol. Cette union improvisée perturbe Jia, mais, petit à petit elle découvre qu'ils sont en fait... parfaits l'un pour l'autre?!
description.hu: Han Jia, jelenleg szabadságon lévő szabadúszó, közismertebb néven munkanélküli. Jia a Holdújévet a nyaggatásával ünneplő családja elől elmenekül "friss levegőt szívni", amikor összefut egy régi ismerőssel. Jin Mincheol, aki a nyomi szomszédkölyök volt egykor Jia szemében, majdnem hasonló cipőben jár, ugyanis az ő családja is azt várja, hogy párt találjon végre magának. Ekkor támad egy zseniális ötlete hősnőnknek, és kezdetét veszi a két lökött főszereplő közös élete.
description.id: Sudah berapa tahun kamu tinggal di rumah orang tua? Han Jiah (pengangguran) yang tahun ini berusia 32 tahun, hari ini juga menderita karena masih belum menikah dan bekerja. Tiba-tiba Jim Minchul, sahabat kecil Jiah muncul dan mereka memutuskan untuk menikah!?? Ternyata mereka berdua malah lebih cocok dari yang diperkirakan?!
description.ko:
집에 얹혀산 지 몇 년 차더라..? 
올해 32살을 맞이한 한지아(일하지 않는 프리랜서/무직)는 주변의 결혼하라는 눈칫밥에 오늘도 고통받는데.. 
때마침 명절을 맞이하여 고향에 내려온 소꿉친구 민철 또한 같은 고민이 있었으니.
그러면 쉬운 해결 방법이 있잖아?!? 그렇게 홧김에 결혼한 두 사람.
그런데 막상 결혼해 보니... 어라?? 생각보다 너무 잘 맞는다?!
description.th: ‘ฮันจีอา’ ฟรีแลนซ์สาววัย 32 ปีที่เบื่อหน่ายกับคำถามเรื่องแต่งงานของพ่อแม่ บังเอิญพบกับเพื่อนสมัยเด็ก ‘จินมินชอล’ หนุ่มเนิร์ดที่โดนคำถามจากพ่อแม่เรื่องนี้เช่นกัน คนโสดทั้งสองตัดสินใจจะหยุดคำถามเหล่านี้ด้วยการแต่งงาน! หรือว่านี่จะเป็นบุพเพสันนิวาส?
description.zh:
厌倦被家人催婚的两人！
就这样稀里糊涂结了婚！
今年32岁的韩智雅没工作，不知在家蹭吃蹭喝了多少年，一直被催婚……正好在过节的时候，智雅遇到了回老家过节的儿时玩伴珉哲。她发现珉哲也有相同的困扰。因此，他们俩一气之下选择结婚……
description.pt-br:
"Há quanto tempo estou deitada em casa...?"

Han Jia, que está completando 32 anos este ano (ela é uma freelancer que ainda não tem um emprego registrado), sofre com a pressão das pessoas ao redor, que ficam dizendo para ela se casar. Na mesma época, Jin Mincheol, seu amigo de infância que veio para a cidade natal de Jia para passar as férias, está tendo o mesmo problema. Então, as duas pessoas se casaram, simples assim. Agora que eles se casaram… 

"Huh? Nós combinamos mais do que pesávamos?"
description.zh-hk: 因為沒工作而一直住在老家的韓智雅總是會被家人催促結婚，就在她瀕臨崩潰的時候，遇到了有相同煩惱的兒時玩伴……

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

altTitles.en: Necromancer! I Am a Disaster
Necromancer: King of The Scourge
Disastrous Necromancer
Catastrophic Necromancer

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

altTitles.en: How About R15?

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

altTitles.ja: 星を継ぐもの

description.en: In 205X, armed forces and conflicts are a thing of the past and people live safe, peaceful lives, all thanks to a cheap, inexhaustible source of energy. One day, something strange is discovered on the moon: an ancient corpse in a spacesuit. The corpse is undeniably human, but it appears to be about 50,000 years old! What does this mean about the history of our species and what effect will this discovery have on current human society?

altTitles.ja: キモオタ、アイドルやるってよ

description.en: "When I woke up this morning there was a beautiful girl, but that was… me!?" - Idol Otaku Aisaka Yousuke wakes up one morning and realizes he's now a beautiful girl named Aisaka Yoko. Now with his new appearance and his great Idol knowledge, he will attempt to become the number one idol.

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

altTitles.en: Evil Land

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

altTitles.en: New Kamen Rider Spirits

altTitles.ja: 新 仮面ライダーSPIRITS

altTitles.en: New Masked Rider Spirits

description.en: Kamen Rider, the righteous warrior who shouts out "Henshin!" and continues to fight evil. The heroes created by the genius Shotaro Ishinomori are brought back to life by the hard-working Muraeda Kenichi!　In this epic hero battle story, the 10th rider "ZX" fights alongside the previous riders against the mysterious organization "BADAN" that is invading the world!

altTitles.en: MAO

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

altTitles.en: Os Cavaleiros do Zodiaco - The Lost Canvas - A Saga de Hades

聖闘士星矢 THE LOST CANVAS 冥王神話

description.en:
This manga tells the story of the previous Holy War, taking place in the 18th century, 250 years before the original series, in the Saint Seiya universe. The story centers on the relation between Tenma, the Pegasus Saint and his beloved friend, Alone, who would eventually become his greatest enemy, Hades.  
  
The story takes place in the same time period as Saint Seiya Next Dimension.
description.pt-br:
Este mangá conta a história da Guerra Santa anterior, que aconteceu no século XVIII, 250 anos antes da série original, no universo de Saint Seiya. A história é centrada na relação entre Tenma, o Cavaleiro de Pégaso e seu amado amigo, Alone, que eventualmente se tornaria seu maior inimigo, Hades. 

A história acontece no mesmo período de tempo de Saint Seiya Next Dimension.

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

description.en: After her sudden death at the hands of an assassin, the former granddaughter of a Yakuza boss reincarnates into an otome game as the heroine. The game is, of course, set in the time of early European mafia (but with magic and other special abilities somehow)—specifically a kingdom where the royal family is supported behind the scenes by five major crime families! "Please God, whyyy, I only wanted to life a normal life!"
description.ja: 「可愛いな、フランチェスカ。愛しているから、どうか俺を退屈させないでくれ」　『友達が欲しい』極道一家の孫娘として育った少女が転生したのは── 近世マフィアが暗躍する女性向けのゲーム世界。王政を裏から支える五大ファミリーの愛娘だった！　望む平穏とは程遠く、ゲーム開始と同時に、メインシナリオ最大の敵＆黒幕とされる若当主・レオナルドに誘拐される始末。持ち前の度胸で難を逃れるも、そのせいで１番距離を置きたい“裏社会のカリスマ”である彼から、謎の執着を持たれてしまい...!?
description.vi:
Một đời làm xã hội đen, suốt đời tái sinh thành phản diện.

Một cô gái khát khao có một cuộc sống bình thường nhưng tác giả không cho phép, tái sinh vào thế giới trong game tình yêu cho nữ sinh, và bị dây dưa tình cảm với một vị hôn thế biến thái aka boss phản diện lớn nhất trong game!

Lịch update: CmoaJP ra đến đâu mua đến đây, tiến độ ra đều đặn. 1 chap/tháng (guess)

Truyện được Việt hóa bởi Spring Blossoms Team.

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.en: Can Even a Mob High Schooler Like Me Be a Normie If I Become an Adventurer?

description.en:
It has been decades since labyrinths first appeared in the modern world of Japan, bringing with them monsters and related catastrophes. With this brought many changes; the biggest one being a new profession called 'Adventurer' and the monster cards they use to summon their own monsters to fight and conquer labyrinths with.

Kitagawa Utamaro, nickname Maro, is a mob highschooler who becomes an adventurer due to being incited by a former friend of his having sudden social success among their peers simply by becoming an adventurer himself.
However, things aren't quite as easy for Maro. Just becoming an adventurer in name only isn't enough for him to gain his spotlight, giving him no recourse but to actually tackle labyrinths with the peculiar and not very versatile monster cards that he barely manages to scrape up.

[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0112fi/)  (JP)

title.en: The Maknae Has to Be an Idol

altTitles.pt-br: O Maknae Precisa Ser Um Idol

description.en:
"I will leave the debut group."
I can't make it in this group. I should leave and set up a chicken restaurant so that my brothers could at least make a name for themselves.
Destined to be a failed idol, I decided to leave the group for the betterment of the others.
However,
[A member dies if you leave the debut group.]
What?
"...This is making me crazy."
The struggles of Bong Tae-Yoon, the Maknae on top, whose hands hold the lives of his group members, begins now!
description.pt-br:
“Vou sair do grupo de estreia.”
Não consigo fazer sucesso nesse grupo. Eu deveria sair e abrir um restaurante de frango pra que meus irmãos pudessem pelo menos fazer um nome pra si mesmos.
Destinado a ser um idol fracassado, decidi deixar o grupo para o bem dos outros.
No entanto,
[Um membro morre se você deixar o grupo de estreia.]
O quê?
“Isso está me deixando louco.”
As lutas de Bong Tae-Yoon, o Maknae que está no topo, cujas mãos seguram as vidas dos membros de seu grupo, começam agora!

altTitles.ja: 君めく夜に焦がれて

altTitles.en: Yearning for a Night Full of You

description.en: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...
description.ja: ここには、由緒正しいお嬢様たちの「瑠璃組」と、素行のよくない不良たちの「藍組」という、相反する2つの勢力があった。七瀬珠月（ななせみつき）は、藍組生徒の中でも、その厳つい見た目から瑠璃組に最も恐れられる存在。そんな見た目にコンプレックスを抱えていた珠月だが、ある夜、夜道を徘徊するお嬢様・宝生悠花（ほうしょうゆうか）に出会い……？

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

altTitles.ja: 怜-Toki-

description.en: A Saki spin-off series. It follows the characters Toki Onjouji, Ryuuka Shimizudani and other girls from Osaka during their elementary and middle school years.

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl
Drunk Thief X Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

altTitles.es-la: Un Ladrón Borracho que Compró una Esclava

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

title.en: Kinsou no Vermeil ~Gakeppuchi Majutshi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsukisusumu~

altTitles.ja: 金装のヴェルメイユ ～崖っぷち魔術師は最強の厄災と魔法世界を突き進む～

altTitles.zh: 金装的维尔梅～濒临堕落的魔法师和最强的灾厄一起冲入魔法世界～

altTitles.ko: 금장의 벨메이유 ∼벼랑 끝 마술사는 최강의 재액과 마법세계를 헤쳐나간다

altTitles.ru: Вермейл в золотом: Сильнейший маг проходит через магический мир с сильнейшей катастрофой

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinsou no Vermeil ~Gakeppuchi Majutshi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsukisusumu~

altTitles.en: Vermeil in Gold: The Failing Student and the Strongest Scourge Plunge Into the World of Magic
Vermeil in Gold: A Desperate Magician Barges Into the Magical World Alongside the Strongest Calamity
Vermeil in Gold

description.en:
A student at the magic school, Alto, who was on the verge of repeating the school year, accidentally found a book that activated a magic circle, and as a result, summoned the sealed devil Vermeil! Vermeil is a very unhealthy older sister with a power devastating enough to be called a disaster!  
  
The apprentice magician walks side by side with the strongest being in existence!!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/91)
description.es: Alto, un estudiante de una escuela de magia que estaba a punto de reprobar, invoco a un demonio sellado: Vermeil, como resultado de la activación de un circulo mágico dentro de un libro que encontró por accidente. Vermeil es una hermana mayor muy seductora con un poder tan grande que se puede decir que es una ¡¿calamidad?! ¡El mago camina con el monstruo mágico más fuerte que existe!
description.ja: 留年の危機に瀕していた魔法学校の生徒・アルトは偶然見つけた本の魔法陣を発動させた結果、封印されていた悪魔・ヴェルメイを召喚してしまった！　ヴェルメイは厄災ともいえる強大な力を持つ、大変不健全なお姉さんで!?　 崖っぷち魔術師が最強の使い魔と歩む王道ファンタジー開幕!!
description.ru: Ученик школы магии Альто, который был на грани того, чтобы остатся на второй учебный год, случайно нашел книгу, которая активировала магический круг, и в результате вызвал запечатанного дьявола Вермеила! Вермеил-очень нездоровая старшая сестра с силой, достаточно разрушительной, чтобы ее можно было назвать катастрофой! Ученик мага идет бок о бок с самым сильным существом на свете!!
description.vi: Một học sinh tại trường phép thuật, Alto, đối mặt với nguy cơ học lại, tình cờ tìm thấy một cuốn sách triệu hổi cũ, và đã triệu hồi ác quỷ bị phong ấn Vermeil!

altTitles.en: Love Love Evil Land

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

altTitles.en: Love Love Freak Island

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.en: Case Closed

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang magaling sa pang-aasar (?) na si Nishikata

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (former) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.fr: Dans ce spin-off de « Quand Takagi me taquine “, et suite de ” Quand Takagi me taquinait », Chi Nishikata fait de son mieux pour taquiner son camarade de classe Ooshiro, mais elle a l'impression de l'avoir déjà rencontré quelque part. Parviendra-t-elle enfin à prendre le dessus sur lui et à se souvenir du passé ?
description.tl: Nagsisimula na ang kwento ng pang-aasar ni Chi Nishikata? Ang kwentong ito ay nakatuon kay Chi, ang anak nina Nishikata at (dating) Takagi. Tulad ng dati, siya ay masigasig sa pang-aasar sa kanyang katabi sa upuan, si Ooshiro...!
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?
